entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening. 60 percent chance of flurries near the Rockies overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 15 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few rain showers or flurries. High plus 3 with temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with a few rain showers changing to snow late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 in the afternoon. High plus 3 with temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then cloudy. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023
